androidx.constraintlayout.widget.Constra: <TextView android:id="@+id/point_tally" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:background="@drawable/red" android:text="Points: 0" android:textColor="@android:color/black" android:textSize="20dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/gridLayout2" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/gridLayout"
